entry.title: Introduction
entry.content:
After finishing high school and some college, I spent time teaching at a private preschool located in Dallas. Not feeling fulfilled, I enrolled in an Esthetician program at a community college. I knew I loved makeup, but was surprised to have immediately fallen in love with waxing as well. I look forward to continuing to help others feel beautiful and confident in their daily lives. If you want to know more about my professional experience, I have a page dedicated to this here.

Before and Afters:

^ Collin College Estitichian Services 2024

^ Collin College Estitichian Services 2024

^ Collin College Estitichian Services 2024

^ Collin College Estitichian Services 2024

^ Collin College Estitichian Services 2024

^ Professional Makeup Services 2019
entry.summary: After finishing high school and some college, I spent time teaching at a private preschool located in Dallas. Not feeling fulfilled, I enrolled in an Esthetician program at a community college. I knew I loved makeup, but was surprised to have immediately fallen in love with waxing as well. I look forward to continuing to help others feel beautiful and confident in their daily lives. If you want to know more about my professional experience, I have a page dedicated to this here.

entry.title: Professional Summary
entry.content:
• Title: Esthetician
  • Email: contact@ellenwaxes.com
  • Instagram: ellenwaxes.dtx
  • Dallas, TX

Experience

Freelance Makeup Artist | 2011 – Current

  • Travel to event venues and private clients in the Dallas/Fort Worth area.
  • Communicate with clients to ensure visual requirements are met.
  • Maintain an up-to-date knowledge of available products in the industry as well as awareness of Texas state health and safety laws.

Curriculum Author @ The Modern Tot | 2018 - Current

  • Develop a play-based curriculum for preschool aged children that will inspire creativity.
  • Organize lessons according to their developmental goals.
  • Design user friendly instructions along with all materials needed for each lesson.

Makeup Artist @ Sephora | 2013 – 2014

  • Meet and exceed sales responsibilities as well as maintain knowledge of all products and brands carried. Perform Custom Makeover and Express Services.

Education

  • Collin College Esthetician Program (2024)

Skills & Services

  • Customized Facials
  • Gel-Based & Layered Chemical Peels
  • Microdermabrasion & Hydrodermabrasion
  • Body & Facial Waxing
  • Lash & Brow Tinting
  • High Frequency & Radio Frequency Modalities
  • Hydrafacial
  • Nano Infusion Pen
  • Dermaplane
entry.summary: Title: Esthetician Email: contact@ellenwaxes.com Instagram: ellenwaxes.dtx Dallas, TX
